participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and spirited, Emma enjoys outdoor activities and has a passion for music.
participant_1.background: i like to ride horses. i have three arabian horses. i like to listen to rock music while working. my father is a farmer.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Reflective and melancholic, Mark often contemplates life and searches for meaning amidst his struggles.
participant_2.background: my wife left me and took my children. i do not believe in god. i'm overweight and unhappy. i work at a nursing home. i spend most of my time on facebook when i'm not working.

content.text: i love horses   i also love country music
